docs.lead_paragraph: In two New Jersey towns, voters appear to be putting off making a firm commitment to any candidate until the last minute.

headline.main: As Primary Nears, Voters Critique Field
headline.sub: Super Tuesday is coming. Not everyone has made a decision. ;
headline.print_headline: As Primary Nears, Voters Critique Field

docs.snippet: In two New Jersey towns, voters appear to be putting off making a firm commitment to any candidate until the last minute.

docs.lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES -- Senator Hillary Rodham Clinton debuted an almost entirely new stump speech at a raucous rally with 5,000 people in Los Angeles on Saturday morning, meanwhile, replacing her old, policy-heavy remarks with a new overarching message - "the America I see" - and new hits on two of her opponents, Mr. Obama and the Republican front-runner, Senator John McCain of Arizona.
docs.abstract: Hillary Rodham Clinton replaced her old, policy-heavy remarks with a new overarching message - "the America I see" - and new hits on two of her opponents.
docs.snippet: Hillary Rodham Clinton replaced her old, policy-heavy remarks with a new overarching message - "the America I see" - and new hits on two of her opponents.

docs.lead_paragraph: Jonathan Gruber, one of the country's leading health care economists -- and someone not affiliated with any of the campaigns -- has a new paper on covering the uninsured. He makes use of a detailed simulation model that he's been developing for several years to assess alternative strategies.
docs.abstract: Jonathan Gruber, one of the country's leading health care economists - and someone not affiliated with any of the campaigns - has a new paper on covering the uninsured. He makes use of a detailed simulation model that he's been developing for several years to assess alternative strategies. One conclusion is that trying to cover [...]

docs.lead_paragraph: A New York appellate court ruled Friday that valid out-of-state marriages of same-sex couples must be legally recognized in New York.

docs.lead_paragraph: The leading antiwar group endorsed Senator Barack Obama on Friday, saying his opposition to the war would make him a stronger general election candidate.

docs.lead_paragraph: Dozens of popular health, housing and education programs would be eliminated or sharply reduced under the budget that President Bush plans to announce on Monday.

docs.lead_paragraph: Numbers of unaffiliated voters have surged in Colorado by 14 percent, even as the numbers of registered Democrats and Republicans sagged or stagnated.
